entry.title: fairlan/event-ai: A lightweight and flexible event management system designed to centralize event handling in JavaScript/TypeScript projects. This library simplifies event definitions, improves code readability, and facilitates debugging by providing a single source of truth for event declarations and usage.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible event management system designed to centralize event handling in JavaScript/TypeScript projects. This library simplifies event definitions, improves code readability, and facilitates debugging by providing a single source of truth for event declarations and usage.
